entry.def: In a film or play, a supporting actor or actress is one who has an important part, but not the most important part.

example.ex: ...the winner of the best supporting actress award.
...acting the supporting role in a Harrison Ford-type movie.
example.tran: 在哈里森·福特类型的电影中饰演配角

means.word_mean: 1. the act of bearing the weight of or strengthening;

sentences.sentence: "he leaned against the wall for support"
"the anxious child needs supporting and accepting treatment from the teacher"

means.word_mean: 2. capable of bearing a structural load;

Sentence.sentence: Millions of American families may now be in the initial stage of their responses to the current crisis, working together and supporting one another through the early months of unemployment.
The Supreme Court will try to change its reputation for supporting large corporations.
